name: Rail On
description:
You are building a new railroad in the frontier. Follow the arrow in the lower right corner to reach your destination. Select from the provided rail pieces to build your track.

Your train drives faster during the day when it gets hot and slows down when its cold in the night. Drive through the forest to collect wood and drive past lakes to collect water. You can slow down your train by consuming water and speed up with wood, by clicking on the icons on the right side of the screen.

Use these resources to get to your goal and don't let the train get too fast or too slow.
